MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH43 postcode area of Walkerburn, affecting properties in Caberston Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 8:20AM. Our engineers are on their way to Peebles Road substation to investigate and repair a suspected blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30AM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:50AM on 08 November 2020.
